ProductInfo.Features:
Scare the crooks away with these awesome surveillance warning signs!
Easy to see 9" by 9" in signs & 6 matching decals Weatherproof!
Vivid contrast of red and white, stop sign design - easy to be noticed
Three-year, no-fade warranty. Our signs are made for outdoor use! The sign is solid weatherproof plastic. Our signs are not made from Coroplast!
All of our security signs and decals are manufactured according to industry standards by one of the world's largest manufacturer of sign and decals.
ProductInfo.Name: 2 Security Camera Spy Sign plus 6 Decals CCTV Weatherproof
